name: Space Walking 3w Project
description:
Purpose: A short little project I created to convey a narrative of a sole survivor onboard a abandoned spaceship.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys - Movement

Shift -  Sprint

Why did I make this game?

This is a game I created as part of my studies. This is a walking sim focused on the visual and narrative aspect, which were the parameters given to me for the project. 

Game Engine:

I used Unity to create this game.
